channel.title: [PI] Adding Npc ( Bob ) to fix Dharok's Parts, Help
channel.description:
I just need help to add bob on barrows area to fix ur barrow sets, but i don't need it if you click at bob to fix all barrows parts, I need
To click(use) at dh axe and at bob, then bob will fix it
Now click(use) at dh legs and at bob, then he will fix it
Now click(use) dh platebody and talk to bob, he will fix it.
Need it make it hard :P
[hr]
Now prices:
Dh axe = 100k
Dh Helm = 60K
Dh legs = 80K
Dh platebody = 40K
[hr]
Like this, rename Crystalbow To Barrows
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/I7k6Oxg.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/07SB9yX.png[/img]

item.title: [PI] Adding Npc ( Bob ) to fix Dharok's Parts, Help
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“Rye, post:13, topic:522387”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=640892.msg4318318#msg4318318 date=1371843450]

[quote author=Rye link=topic=640892.msg4318317#msg4318317 date=1371843351]

[quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=640892.msg4318316#msg4318316 date=1371843250]

[quote author=Rye link=topic=640892.msg4318315#msg4318315 date=1371843074]

I’m not doing everything for you
[/quote]Fine.

I told you how to start it, so start it
[/quote]It’s hard for me, beacuse I’m new and learning, so if you help me via teamviewer at least i learn something.

If I help you here you get to learn something and it will be saved so you can look back at it later.
[/quote]Wow, i need it this, if no one will help me with it, I’ll remove it No tele for players :S

What?
[/quote]You gonna help me via teamviewer if no, i’ll delete this from my server. Anyways if you dont gonna help me, make sure don’t reply again, i need other players help me :([/quote]
I am one of the most experienced helpers here for the exact server you’re working on. If you don’t want to take help using the forums, then don’t come on them. The point of this section is to ask for help, and have others help you on the forums

I am willing to help you, just not on teamviewer.

Picture1.jpg677×822

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Adding Npc ( Bob ) to fix Dharok's Parts, Help
item.dc:creator: @Rye Rye
item.description:
@Rye wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:4, topic:522387”]Okay, so you’re going to want to add a case to UseItemOnNpc, the ID would the the ID of the item you want to use.
Then have that case open a dialogue.[/quote]I can’t do it please, have teamviewer come help me with it

If you have, I’ll pm my ID/PASS.

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] Adding Npc ( Bob ) to fix Dharok's Parts, Help

item.title: [PI] Adding Npc ( Bob ) to fix Dharok's Parts, Help
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Okay, so you’re going to want to add a case to UseItemOnNpc, the ID would the the ID of the item you want to use.
Then have that case open a dialogue.

Read full topic
